title: FiveThirtyEight - Wikipedia
snippet: On September 18, 2023, the original website domain at fivethirtyeight.com was closed, with web traffic becoming redirected to ABC News pages, and its logo was replaced, with the name 538 used instead of FiveThirtyEight. On March 5, 2025, 538 was shut down by ABC News and its staff were laid off.

title: Our Data | FiveThirtyEight
snippet: We’re sharing the data and code behind some of our articles and graphics.

title: Daring Fireball: ABC Shuts Down FiveThirtyEight, and Pulls the Plug on Its Website
snippet: I’m told he appeared to be reading from a script as he delivered the devastating news. He offered no explanation for why the Disney-owned network had decided to shutter FiveThirtyEight, which it acquired in 2018 along with data whiz and then-editor Nate Silver.

title: r/OutOfTheLoop on Reddit: What is up with Project Fivethirtyeight disappearing?
snippet: On September 18, 2023, the original ... with the name 538 used instead of FiveThirtyEight. On March 5, 2025, the website was shut down by ABC News and its staff was laid off....

title: FiveThirtyEight is shutting down as part of broader cuts at ABC and Disney | Nieman Journalism Lab
snippet: Owen, Laura Hazard. "FiveThirtyEight is shutting down as part of broader cuts at ABC and Disney." Nieman Journalism Lab. Last modified March 5, 2025. Accessed December 7, 2025.
